[i]Player Vs Player Special Attack Death Food Equip Item UnEquip Drop Item Switch Item Walking Chat Pvp item degrade Some stand, walk, run anim for weapon Ranging D bolt e Spec Magic on Player Melee Attack and Defence bonus Range Attack and Defence bonus Magic Attack and Defence bonus Elysian and Divine spirit shield bonus Ground item Pickup item Single combat area Pking drop (other players item) Special attack bar Special using special attack bar Banking deposit and withdraw Setstring, show weapon name and bonus NPCS Potions (super set, ranging, saradomin brew, super restore) Stats restore delay Item on item to make potion doses, (1) + (1) = 2 lol. For every potion released Fixed saving and loading Characters Made Player vs Npc (need npc mask, working on it) Shop, sell and buy Trading (working) Grand Exchange Equipment interface almost full Npc combat Npc attack back[/i]
[b][i]Features V2.0[/i][/b]
[i]More NPC's More Shops D Claws - 100% D Claws Special - 100% More Customs Real Runescape Tabs Some Runescape Customs New Weapon Intefaces
Allot More..[/i]
[b][i]Commands [::][/i][/b]
[i]Shop Switch Ge String [I ID] [C ID] Interface [I ID] Item [I ID] [I A][/i]
